attributes.action: Please move the Philippines to Amber/Green list.
attributes.additional_details: Like other residents here, lots of Filipinos (especially in NHS) have played a great role in helping in the fight against Coronavirus. May we please ask if we could have the chance to see loved ones back in the Philippines? This will help Filipinos here in UK take a well-deserved break (rest physically and mentally too).
attributes.background: With limited vaccine supply, the Philippines have been doing their best to vaccinate people and handle the Covid situation. Lots of Filipinos have been working tirelessly (esp in NHS) but are unable to go see family back in the PH. Please help us see our loved ones too.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591526
